title: Restaurant Preference: A Two Way Table
question_text:
For his final statistics project, Ramsey completed a study to determine which of $4$ local restaurants students at his school preferred. After gathering data he organized the counts for each restaurant into the table shown below.
Pancake Factory Onion Garden Emerald Wednesdays Cayenne Total
Boys 25 28 12 43 108
Girls 30 33 27 32 122
Total 55 61 39 75 230
$\ $
What is the conditional distribution of gender for those who prefer Cayenne?
tables:
Pancake FactoryOnion GardenEmerald WednesdaysCayenneTotal
Boys25281243108
Girls30332732122
Total55613975230
